long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Similar Shopify Stores ‚Äî Click and catch all similar stores across 2M Shopify stores, and narrow down competitors with filters.
Everything in this Chrome extension is FREE, proudly presented by SimplyTrends. 

What is Similar Shopify Stores
Once you launch it on a Shopify store page, you will find all its competitors across 2 million Shopify stores instantly. With filters, you can easily scale down competitors with different metrics. 

Why Similar Shopify Stores
Switch to Similar Shopify Stores from Koala Inspector or Ali Hunter, and rule the game in a new way. 
‚úÖ Click to view current store's Shopify competitors.
‚úÖ Filters: Top country, traffic, monthly revenue.
‚úÖ View all eligible competitors in one place.
‚úÖ Sort results efficiently, and view them in Grid/List View.

How to Use Similar Shopify Stores
‚òùÔ∏è Install the Chrome Extension.
‚úåÔ∏è Register SimplyTrends account for free.
üëå Launch it on any Shopify Store page, and click to explore competitors.
